channel.title: Ethernet Management
channel.description: Ethernet Management allows you to configure network settings for an Ethernet interface. You can choose to manually enter your network settings or try to automatically acquire them from a DHCP server.

item.title: Automatically Get IP Information
item.description: Try to get an IP address from a DHCP server. A valid IP address is required if you want to access the NCL Club repository or start a SSH server. The IP address acquired will be shown after selection.

item.title: Manually Enter IP Information
item.description: Manually enter all your IP configuration. A valid IP address is required if you want to access the NCL Club repository or start a SSH server.
